author: Nate Young
comment: Has all the basic information you would expect from an app like this. Coverage of games outside the UK is very limited, often not providing basic information easily available elsewhere on the internet. I've also found using the app to be rather harsh on my mobile data usage and battery life.

Not as intuitive as some other apps, player stats are random. Hard to work out sometimes. The Goal app is awesome for stats, if Fot managed to be as thorough, would be the best. Also I'm struggling with alerts. Otherwise, looks nice and fun to use.

author: Mohit Bhardwaj
comment: Thanks for adding TV schedules for India. Was waiting for it. Loving your app. Best football app to ever exist on play store.  One thing i noticed - dailymotion videos never work for me,never. Please look into it.Thx devs.

author: Iva Ivanova
comment: Has all the info a man needs! It's up to date and has all the news and etc. It's great! Sadly I think they don't show teams from my country but nobody wants to see them anyway

author: Owusu Augustine
comment: Very bad notifications. It delays about two minutes. You have useful application but You don't upgrade it. You should work on the notification. It delays. You work on it or I stop using it.

author: Ayoub Mallya
comment: I like this app since,  but i find one problem,,- notiffication is delay check this problem.           *Download this app is the best my friend!✔

author: Ryan
comment: The cleanest, best-designed and beautiful football app out there. Really appreciate the love they obviously put into this. Football by and for football fans! Everything you could want. 😁⚽
Great App but as a Liverpool fan most of the news is blocked by "This is Anfield" adblocker pop-ups.  Please work something out with that news site.

author: knight rider
comment: Initially was good. But recent app updates have dampened the experience. Kickoff updates are not  coming. More ads in the app which has made the app bulky and takes time in opening.

author: Paul O
comment: Nicely aggregates the information for me but it doesn't do the very basic of things I want an app like this for and that is to notify me! Very patchy implementation of notifications on phone and wearable. Not for me this one.

reply.author: NorApps AS
reply.content:
Sorry for any trouble. We are currently working on improving the speed of notifications.

What sort of problems are you having with wearable? If you like, send us an email at support@norapps.no.

author: Robert Woolmer
comment: Excellent app. All the information you need. Great coverage of all leagues with injuries, team news etc. Well worth paying a little for premium too. Only a one off fee.

author: Chris Leaver
comment: For scores, live tables and lineups in every league and competition you can ever think of, and many more you can't, this is simply the best app on the market...and it's free!

author: rhonchio ngullie
comment: If you are a football fan you better install this app. This is the best app you will ever find in play store. You miss this app and your life is incomplete. ;)

author: Adam Arcaro
comment: Great app, been using it for years. Latest update crashes constantly, maybe it's just my device
I think it's really useful for navigating scores from around the world and I can also find out some really cool facts

author: Shubham Rai
comment: Well worth to use it,all football buzz, you get here  . Great coverage of all leagues with  all important info.  Excellent app.

author: Pritam Pathak
comment: Great app! One glitch maybe- Some of the favourites I marked do not appear on top.

author: Kawsu Jallow
comment: Add multi language commentary on other leagues that don't speak English

author: Jimbo Byrne
comment: Recently updated and now I can't minimize a league. Taken a star off for that. Great app otherwise
I've tried them all, there isn't a better football app than this

Goals, red cards and other notification are always late. sometimes it take the app 3 min to send a notification about a goal or whatsoever. On the other hand, I love the media part where goals' highlights are posted shortly after the goal was scored.

author: Swati Nair
comment: It's good, but sucks when you're trying to keep track of I League games.  Edit: They've added an update that says they have India TV schedules so I'm happy about that.

author: Kevin Lim
comment: Really packed with lots of info and stats...The best app I have seen

author: Mario Jardel
comment: This was a great soccer app. Now with the latest update, it is Full of Ads!!!

author: Aritra Choudhury
comment: This app has all what it takes but it lacks behind in providing unsufficient information on the indian clubs of the indian league.

author: abdoulaye Welle
comment: Something that I like about this is that you can see  when someone  gonna be expected to come back from injury.

author: Subash kc
comment: Why was the option to close a league by clicking on the top bar removed?

reply.author: NorApps AS
reply.content:
Our data showed that was a very under utilized feature and we tried to find something that would get more use.

But you are not alone! We have plenty of users reach out about missing this. We are looking to bring this back in some way. For now...check out the Filter & Sort Tournaments feature under more options.

author: Aniq Zhafran
comment: Too many content from Arsenal Fan TV (so called 'Fan'; my a*s) which is TOXIC & RUBBISH.
like it alot...but i think u should bring back the bet odds for all the matchs

author: Srinath Jk
comment: Only problem is that live match commentary delay is there

author: Yan Chudnovsky
comment: Great app. I get all my football news and games scores from it!  Hope some day it will have season games-calendar to add to my google calender...

author: Colin Munslow
comment: Dropped this from 5 to 4 because the 'table' option appears to have disappeared !!

author: Hector Hernandez
comment: It's a great app,  they update scores just seconds after they score.

author: Pramod Khadka
comment: Great for for results and I also use to listen to commentary. If possible please add English play by play test for foreign leagues such as bundesliga and French league.

author: AdHvayth Reddy
comment: Every tym open it crashes  Pls fix d problem

Many matches are missing in TV schedules from Brazil and Argentina. Bayern Munchen matches are nowhere to be found every week despite the fact that are always broadcasted on these countries. Please solve it.

author: martyn mcwilliam
comment: Brilliant app .  Only thing I would change would b to get all well knowing teams line ups 👌

author: Aditya Bandiwadekar
comment: New update is the worst...app crashing constantly on opening!! Please fix it Asap!!

reply.author: NorApps AS
reply.content: Hey there sorry you are having trouble! If you would like, please send us a Contact Us email within the app so we can get a better look at the problem. We'd be happy to help you out!

author: mfalme254
comment: Everything Great!! Only critique i have is the 15 min match reminder. It would be good to have this adjustable to 1 hr before or even 6 hrs before.
